Sentencas: Sol-gel routes are often investigated and adapted to prepare, by suitable chemical modifications, sub-micronic powders and derived materials with controlled morphology, which cannot be obtained by conventional solid state chemistry paths.
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers

Sentencas: Wet chemistry methods provide attractive alternative routes because mixing of species occurs at the atomic scale.
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers

Sentencas: In this paper, ultrafine powders were prepared by a novel synthesis method based on the sol-gel process and were dispersed into suspensions before processing.
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers

Sentencas: This paper presents new developments for the preparation of functional materials like yttria-stabilized-zirconia (YSZ, 8% Y(2)O(3)) used as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers

Sentencas: YSZ thick films were coated onto porous Ni-YSZ substrates using a suspension with an optimized formulation deposited by either a dip-coating or a spin-coating process.
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers

Sentencas: The suspension composition is based on YSZ particles encapsulated by a zirconium alkoxide which was added with an alkoxide derived colloidal sol.
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers

Sentencas: The in situ growth of these colloids increases significantly the layer density after an appropriated heat treatment.
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers

Sentencas: The derived films were continuous, homogeneous and around 20 mu M thick.
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers

Sentencas: The possible up-scaling of this process has been also considered and the suitable processing parameters were defined in order to obtain, at an industrial scale, homogeneous, crack-free, thick and adherent films after heat treatment at 1400 degrees C. (C) 2010
Titulo: The sol-gel route: A versatile process for up-scaling the fabrication of gas-tight thin electrolyte layers
